first_para: Deborah Angela Elspeth Abrahams (born 15 September 1960) is a British politician, who has been the Labour Member of Parliament for the Oldham East and Saddleworth constituency since a by-election in January 2011. Her previous career was as a public health consultant.

full.extract: Deborah Angela Elspeth Abrahams (born 15 September 1960) is a British politician, who has been the Labour Member of Parliament for the Oldham East and Saddleworth constituency since a by-election in January 2011. Her previous career was as a public health consultant.
full.title: Debbie Abrahams
